cards.name: Varamyr Sixskins
cards.text: Reaction: After the challenges phase begins, until the end of the phase, Varamyr Sixskins gains (choose one): - the Bear trait and gets +5 STR. - the Eagle trait, an [intrigue] icon, and insight. - the Cat trait, a [power] icon, and stealth. - the Wolf trait and intimidate, and gets +2 STR.

cards.name: Bolton Flayer
cards.text: Shadow (2). Forced Interrupt: When the challenges phase ends, choose and kill a character with the lowest printed cost (cannot be saved).

cards.name: Northern Armory
cards.text: Northern Armory cannot stand. Action: Kneel Northern Armory to choose and stand a [stark] character. +1 Income.

cards.name: Scheming Septon
cards.text: Shadow (2). Challenges Action: Draw 1 card and gain 2 gold. Then, place Scheming Septon on top of your deck. (Limit once per phase.)

cards.name: Margaery's Influence
cards.text: Terminal. Action: While attached character is participating in a challenge, kneel Margaery's Influence and pay 1 gold to stand attached character and remove it from the challenge.

cards.name: Janos Slynt
cards.text: Shadow (0). Forced Reaction: After Janos Slynt comes out of shadows, sacrifice a [thenightswatch] character.

cards.name: Fresh Recruits
cards.text: Action: Search your deck for a Ranger character, a Builder character, and a Steward character, reveal them, and add them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.

cards.name: Shadow Priestess
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Shadow Priestess comes out of shadows, choose and kneel a character without attachments.

cards.name: Stormlands Fiefdom
cards.text: Action: Kneel Stormlands Fiefdom to move 1 power from a character or location to its owner's faction card. +1 Income.

cards.name: Ser Robert Strong
cards.text: Shadow (5). Reaction: After Ser Robert Strong comes out of shadows, choose and kill a kneeling character with printed cost 5 or lower.

cards.name: Beneath the Bridge of Dream
cards.text: Shadow (0). Interrupt: When you choose a plot card to reveal in the plot phase, instead shuffle your used pile into your plot deck and choose a plot card to reveal at random. Until the end of the round, increase the gold value on your revealed plot card by 2.

cards.name: Nighttime Marauders
cards.text: Pillage. Shadow (3). Reaction: After Nighttime Marauders comes out of shadows, choose a card in an opponent's discard pile. That player reveals his or her hand and discards from it each card with the same printed cost as the chosen card.

cards.name: Seize the Initiative
cards.text: X is the number of opponents you have. Interrupt: When the marshaling phase ends, you become the first player.

cards.name: Aegon Targaryen
cards.text: Shadow (3). Reaction: After Aegon Targaryen enters play, search your deck for an Army or Mercenary character, put it into play, and shuffle your deck. At the end of the phase, if that card is still in play, return it to your hand.

cards.name: Unexpected Return
cards.text: Challenges Action: Choose a character in your discard pile and put it into play.

cards.name: Ser Gerris Drinkwater
cards.text: Renown. Shadow (5). Reaction: After Ser Gerris Drinkwater comes out of shadows, choose a card in your plot deck and switch it with a card in your used pile.

cards.name: The Shadow City
cards.text: Shadow (2). Reduce the cost to marshal each of your cards into shadows by 1. Challenges Action: Kneel The Shadow City and discard 1 card from shadows to draw 2 cards.

cards.name: Nefarious Acolyte
cards.text: Shadow (2). Action: Kneel Nefarious Acolyte and pay 1 gold to choose a plot card. Until the end of the phase, treat it as if its printed text box were blank (except for Traits).

cards.name: Burning the Dead
cards.text: Action: Remove each non-unique character in each player's dead pile from the game. Draw 1 card.

cards.name: Exchange of Information
cards.text: When Revealed: Choose an opponent and reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. That opponent chooses 1 character, 1 location, 1 attachment, and 1 event revealed this way, if able, and adds them to your hand. Shuffle your deck.
